(Complete Data Ends: March 30, 2022)Customer Carbon Calculator
Many Akamai customers share our focus on reducing emissions, including 
those generated by their IT suppliers. That’s why we created the Carbon Calculator, a tool that shows an estimated calculation of the emissions produced by an individual customer’s actual use of Akamai Connected Cloud delivery and security services.
Integrated into the Akamai Control Center, the Carbon Calculator provides 
an estimate of the emissions associated with a specific subset of customer traffic for a specified date range, from the last 48 hours to a period of up to three months. Customers can see at a glance the total bytes delivered and the calculated emissions in grams, kilograms and metric tonnes of CO2 equivalency. The information reported by the calculator also provides a view of estimated emissions by country, color-coded by the volume of bytes and emissions, from low to high.
The Carbon Calculator is an innovative tool for meeting our commitment 
to keeping Akamai customers informed and engaged on the issue of emissions reduction.Environmental / 02 Net-Zero Emissions
